history.content:
Contact Professor Hilfinger via email, asking him to respond to you ASAP. You also need 3 days from BIO to process your new I-20 so hopefully, you can get the form by tomorrow. I don't think the process can be done remotely as you cannot travel without your I-20 and BIO would be processing a new one for you.

---------

Hilfinger is very fast and usually will send a signed CPT within a day (my situation this year and last year). If I were you, I would talk with BIO today either by phone or by going there in person to make 100% sure that they are familiar with your situation and so that you can hopefully get an exception to be made and have your new I-20 before Friday

Contact Professor Hilfinger via email, asking him to respond to you ASAP. You also need 3 days from BIO to process your new I-20 so hopefully, you can get the form by tomorrow. I don't think the process can be done remotely as you cannot travel without your I-20 and BIO would be processing a new one for you.
Contact Professor Hilfinger via email, asking him to respond to you ASAP. You also need 3 days from BIO to process your new I-20 so hopefully, you can get the form by tomorrow.

I recently got an internship offer over the summer, but only have this week left to apply for CPT, as I am travelling abroad. I have submitted the form to Prof. Hilfinger, but am afraid that I will not make it in time. Will it be possible to complete the application process remotely?
history.subject: Apply for CPT remotely
